metadata.title: RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H: Sample software (examples of using driver software)

sections.content:
Question:
Do you provide an example source code used to call (use) driver software?
Answer:
We provide example programs with such examples. Example programs can be obtained from the RZ/T2H product website http://www.renesas.com/rzt2h or the RZ/N2H product website http://www.renesas.com/rzn2h.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H
